page.title: 11About Horses, Stebbing
page.content: There is a riding school in Stebbing, which is very popular.There are thirteen ponies and horses. You can have lessons every weekend.Five people help there.About thirty people go to the stables. They have different breeds which include a thoroughbred.There isn't any limit to females,but men aren't allowed.There are usually five lessons a week. We have a Blacksmith who comes to the village,he has a forge in one of the farms,so people take their horses there to be shod.He also has a portable forge which he carries around in the back of his van so he goes to peoples horses as well.
